data.message: I wont stop getting notifications and couldnt figure out how to stop it so I had to say I dont like photo. I hope I get no more now. I did like the pic and what it said I just couldnt deal with the notifications blowin up my phone for 2 days, sorry

replies.message: Hi Summer. You can turn off the notifications on a post you have engaged with in a few easy steps. Select the globe icon in the top right, hover your cursor over the post you wish to stop receiving notifications from and select the 'x' to turn off notifications. Let us know if this helps. - Elissa
